00152 void EnterIMPAttributeSelection( void )
00153 {
00154   
00155 
00156       // set attributes and skills
00157       if( ( fReturnStatus == FALSE ) && ( fFirstIMPAttribTime == TRUE ) )
00158       {
00159             // re starting
00160     SetAttributes( );
00161   
00162             gpCurrentScrollBox = NULL;
00163             giCurrentlySelectedStat = -1;
00164 
00165         // does character have PROBLEMS!!?!?!
00166             /*
00167         if( DoesCharacterHaveAnAttitude() )
00168             {
00169       iCurrentBonusPoints+= 10;
00170             }
00171         if( DoesCharacterHaveAPersoanlity( ) )
00172             {     
00173               iCurrentBonusPoints += 10;
00174             }
00175             */
00176       }
00177   fReturnStatus = TRUE;
00178       fFirstIMPAttribTime = FALSE;
00179 
00180       // create done button
00181       CreateIMPAttributeSelectionButtons( ); 
00182       // create clider buttons
00183       CreateAttributeSliderButtons( );
00184 
00185       // the mouse regions
00186       CreateSlideRegionMouseRegions( );
00187   //CreateSliderBarMouseRegions( );
00188 
00189       // render background
00190   RenderIMPAttributeSelection( );
00191   
00192   
00193 
00194       return;
00195 }

00249 
00250 void HandleIMPAttributeSelection( void )
00251 {
00252 
00253       // review mode, do not allow changes
00254   if( fReviewStats )
00255       {
00256             return;
00257       }
00258 
00259       // set the currently selectd slider bar
00260       if( gfLeftButtonState && gpCurrentScrollBox != NULL )
00261       {
00262             //if theuser is holding down the mouse cursor to left of the start of the slider bars
00263             if( gusMouseXPos < ( SKILL_SLIDE_START_X + LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X ) )
00264             {
00265                   DecrementStat( giCurrentlySelectedStat );
00266             }
00267 
00268             //else if the user is holding down the mouse button to the right of the scroll bars
00269             else if( gusMouseXPos > ( LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + SKILL_SLIDE_START_X + BAR_WIDTH  ) )
00270             {
00271                   IncrementStat( giCurrentlySelectedStat );
00272             }
00273             else
00274             {
00275                   INT32       iCurrentAttributeValue;
00276                   INT32       sNewX = gusMouseXPos;
00277                   INT32       iNewValue;
00278                   INT32       iCounter;
00279 
00280 
00281                   // get old stat value
00282               iCurrentAttributeValue = GetCurrentAttributeValue( giCurrentlySelectedStat );
00283                   iNewValue = DetermineNewValue( sNewX );
00284 
00285                   // chenged, move mouse region if change large enough
00286       if( iCurrentAttributeValue != iNewValue )
00287                   {
00288          // update screen
00289          fHasAnySlidingBarMoved = TRUE;
00290                   }
00291 
00292       // change is enough
00293       if ( iNewValue - iCurrentAttributeValue > 0)
00294                   {
00295                         // positive, increment stat
00296         iCounter = iNewValue - iCurrentAttributeValue;
00297                         for( iCounter; iCounter > 0; iCounter--)
00298                         {
00299                               IncrementStat( giCurrentlySelectedStat );
00300                         }
00301                   }
00302                   else
00303                   {
00304                         // negative, decrement stat
00305         iCounter = iCurrentAttributeValue - iNewValue;
00306                         for( iCounter; iCounter > 0; iCounter--)
00307                         {
00308                               DecrementStat( giCurrentlySelectedStat );
00309                         }
00310                   }
00311             }
00312 
00313             RenderIMPAttributeSelection( );
00314       }
00315       else
00316       {
00317             gpCurrentScrollBox = NULL;
00318             giCurrentlySelectedStat = -1;
00319       }
00320 
00321 
00322       // prcoess current state of attributes
00323       ProcessAttributes( );
00324   
00325       // has any bar moved?
00326       if( fHasAnySlidingBarMoved )
00327       {
00328             // render
00329             if( uiBarToReRender == -1 )
00330             {
00331                   RenderIMPAttributeSelection( );
00332             }
00333             else
00334             {
00335                   
00336                   RenderAttributeFrameForIndex( 51, 87, uiBarToReRender );
00337                   /*
00338                   // print text for screen
00339                   PrintImpText( );
00340   
00341                   // amt of bonus pts
00342                   DrawBonusPointsRemaining( );
00343 
00344                   RenderAttributeFrame( 51, 87 );
00345                   
00346                   // render attribute boxes
00347                   RenderAttributeBoxes( );
00348                   
00349                   PrintImpText( );
00350 
00351                   InvalidateRegion( LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + 51, LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + 87, LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + 51 + 400, LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + 87 + 220 );
00352 */
00353                   uiBarToReRender = -1;
00354                   MarkButtonsDirty();
00355             }
00356 
00357             fHasAnySlidingBarMoved = FALSE;
00358 
00359       }
00360       if ( fSkillAtZeroWarning == TRUE )
00361       {
00362             DoLapTopMessageBox( MSG_BOX_IMP_STYLE, pSkillAtZeroWarning[ 0 ], LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, StatAtZeroBoxCallBack);
00363             fSkillAtZeroWarning = FALSE;
00364 
00365       }
00366       return;
00367 }

00371 void ProcessAttributes( void )
00372 {
00373 
00374       //Kaiden: Ignore the values in the below comment, this is now controlled by
00375       // Values externalized in the Ja2_Options.ini file.
00376 
00377       // this function goes through and confirms thet state of attributes, ie not allowing attributes to
00378       // drop below 35 or skills to go below 0...and if skill is 34 set to 0
00379 
00380       // check any attribute below 35
00381 
00382       INT32 iMinAttribute = gGameExternalOptions.iMinAttribute;
00383       INT32 iMaxAttribute = gGameExternalOptions.iMaxAttribute;
00384 
00385       // strength
00386       if( iCurrentStrength <= iMinAttribute )
00387       {
00388             iCurrentStrength = iMinAttribute;
00389             // disable button too
00390 
00391 
00392       }
00393 
00394   // dex
00395       if( iCurrentDexterity <= iMinAttribute )
00396       {
00397             iCurrentDexterity = iMinAttribute;
00398             // disable button too
00399 
00400 
00401       }
00402 
00403    // agility
00404       if( iCurrentAgility <= iMinAttribute )
00405       {
00406             iCurrentAgility = iMinAttribute;
00407             // disable button too
00408 
00409 
00410       }
00411 
00412        // wisdom
00413       if( iCurrentWisdom <= iMinAttribute )
00414       {
00415             iCurrentWisdom = iMinAttribute;
00416             // disable button too
00417 
00418 
00419       }
00420 
00421    // Kaiden: Leadership should be zero-able
00422    // LeaderShip
00423    //if( iCurrentLeaderShip <= MIN_ATTIBUTEPOINT )
00424    //{
00425    //iCurrentLeaderShip = MIN_ATTIBUTEPOINT;
00426    // disable button too
00427    //}
00428 
00429        // health
00430       if( iCurrentHealth <= iMinAttribute )
00431       {
00432             iCurrentHealth = iMinAttribute;
00433             // disable button too
00434 
00435       }
00436 
00437 
00438 
00439 
00440       // now check for above MAX_ATTIBUTEPOINT
00441   // strength
00442       if( iCurrentStrength >= iMaxAttribute )
00443       {
00444             iCurrentStrength = iMaxAttribute;
00445             // disable button too
00446 
00447 
00448       }
00449 
00450   // dex
00451       if( iCurrentDexterity >= iMaxAttribute )
00452       {
00453             iCurrentDexterity = iMaxAttribute;
00454             // disable button too
00455 
00456 
00457       }
00458 
00459    // agility
00460       if( iCurrentAgility >= iMaxAttribute )
00461       {
00462             iCurrentAgility = iMaxAttribute;
00463             // disable button too
00464 
00465 
00466       }
00467 
00468        // wisdom
00469       if( iCurrentWisdom >= iMaxAttribute )
00470       {
00471             iCurrentWisdom = iMaxAttribute;
00472             // disable button too
00473 
00474 
00475       }
00476 
00477    // LeaderShip
00478       if( iCurrentLeaderShip >= iMaxAttribute )
00479       {
00480             iCurrentLeaderShip = iMaxAttribute;
00481             // disable button too
00482 
00483 
00484       }
00485 
00486        // health
00487       if( iCurrentHealth >= iMaxAttribute )
00488       {
00489             iCurrentHealth = iMaxAttribute;
00490             // disable button too
00491 
00492       }
00493 
00494   return;
00495 }

00497 UINT8 IncrementStat( INT32 iStatToIncrement )
00498 {
00499   // this function is responsable for incrementing a stat
00500 
00501       
00502       INT32 iMinAttribute = gGameExternalOptions.iMinAttribute;
00503       INT32 iMaxAttribute = gGameExternalOptions.iMaxAttribute;
00504       INT32 iMaxZeroBonus = gGameExternalOptions.iMaxZeroBonus;
00505 
00506       // review mode, do not allow changes
00507   if( fReviewStats )
00508       {
00509             return( SLIDER_ERROR );
00510       }
00511 
00512       // make sure we have enough bonus points
00513       if( iCurrentBonusPoints < 1 )
00514       {
00515             // nope...GO GET SOME BONUS POINTS, IDIOT!
00516             return( SLIDER_ERROR );
00517       }
00518 
00519       // check to make sure stat isn't maxed out already
00520       switch( iStatToIncrement )
00521       {
00522             case( STRENGTH_ATTRIBUTE ):
00523               if( iCurrentStrength > iMaxAttribute -1 )
00524                   {
00525                         // too high, leave
00526                         return( SLIDER_OUT_OF_RANGE );
00527       }
00528               else
00529                   {
00530                         iCurrentStrength++;
00531                     iCurrentBonusPoints--;
00532                   }
00533             break;
00534     case( DEXTERITY_ATTRIBUTE ):
00535               if( iCurrentDexterity > iMaxAttribute -1 )
00536                   {
00537                         // too high, leave
00538                         return( SLIDER_OUT_OF_RANGE );
00539       }
00540               else
00541                   {
00542                         iCurrentDexterity++;
00543                     iCurrentBonusPoints--;
00544                   }
00545             break;
00546             case( AGILITY_ATTRIBUTE ):
00547               if( iCurrentAgility > iMaxAttribute -1 )
00548                   {
00549                         // too high, leave
00550                         return( SLIDER_OUT_OF_RANGE );
00551       }
00552               else
00553                   {
00554                         iCurrentAgility++;
00555                     iCurrentBonusPoints--;
00556                   }
00557             break;
00558             case( WISDOM_ATTRIBUTE ):
00559               if( iCurrentWisdom > iMaxAttribute -1 )
00560                   {
00561                         // too high, leave
00562                         return( SLIDER_OUT_OF_RANGE );
00563       }
00564               else
00565                   {
00566                         iCurrentWisdom++;
00567                     iCurrentBonusPoints--;
00568                   }
00569             break;
00570             case( HEALTH_ATTRIBUTE ):
00571               if( iCurrentHealth > iMaxAttribute -1 )
00572                   {
00573                         // too high, leave
00574                         return( SLIDER_OUT_OF_RANGE );
00575       }
00576               else
00577                   {
00578                         iCurrentHealth++;
00579                     iCurrentBonusPoints--;
00580                   }
00581             break;
00582             case( LEADERSHIP_ATTRIBUTE ):
00583               if( iCurrentLeaderShip > iMaxAttribute -1 )
00584                   {
00585                         // too high, leave
00586                         return( SLIDER_OUT_OF_RANGE );
00587                   }
00588               else
00589                   {
00590                         if( iCurrentLeaderShip == 0)
00591                         {
00592                               if( DoWeHaveThisManyBonusPoints( iMaxZeroBonus ) == TRUE )
00593                               {
00594                                 iCurrentLeaderShip+=iMinAttribute;
00595                                 iCurrentBonusPoints-=iMaxZeroBonus;
00596                                     fSkillAtZeroWarning = FALSE;
00597                               }
00598                               else
00599                               {
00600                                     return( SLIDER_OK );
00601                               }
00602                         }
00603                         else
00604                         {
00605                           iCurrentLeaderShip++;
00606                       iCurrentBonusPoints--;
00607                         }
00608                   }
00609             break;
00610             case( MARKSMANSHIP_SKILL ):
00611               if( iCurrentMarkmanship > iMaxAttribute -1 )
00612                   {
00613                         // too high, leave
00614                         return( SLIDER_OUT_OF_RANGE );
00615       }
00616               else
00617                   {
00618                         if( iCurrentMarkmanship == 0)
00619                         {
00620                               if( DoWeHaveThisManyBonusPoints( iMaxZeroBonus ) == TRUE )
00621                               {
00622                                 iCurrentMarkmanship+=iMinAttribute;
00623                                 iCurrentBonusPoints-=iMaxZeroBonus;
00624                                     fSkillAtZeroWarning = FALSE;
00625                               }
00626                               else
00627                               {
00628                                     return( SLIDER_OK );
00629                               }
00630                         }
00631                         else
00632                         {
00633                           iCurrentMarkmanship++;
00634                       iCurrentBonusPoints--;
00635                         }
00636                   }
00637             break;
00638             case( MECHANICAL_SKILL ):
00639               if( iCurrentMechanical > iMaxAttribute -1 )
00640                   {
00641                         // too high, leave
00642                         return( SLIDER_OUT_OF_RANGE );
00643       }
00644               else
00645                   {
00646                         if( iCurrentMechanical == 0)
00647                         {
00648                               if( DoWeHaveThisManyBonusPoints( iMaxZeroBonus ) == TRUE )
00649                               {
00650                                 iCurrentMechanical+=iMinAttribute;
00651                                 iCurrentBonusPoints-=iMaxZeroBonus;
00652                                     fSkillAtZeroWarning = FALSE;
00653                               }
00654                               else
00655                               {
00656                                     return( SLIDER_OK );
00657                               }
00658                         }
00659                         else
00660                         {
00661                           iCurrentMechanical++;
00662                       iCurrentBonusPoints--;
00663                         }
00664                   }
00665             break;
00666             case( MEDICAL_SKILL ):
00667               if( iCurrentMedical > iMaxAttribute -1 )
00668                   {
00669                         // too high, leave
00670                         return( SLIDER_OUT_OF_RANGE );
00671       }
00672               else
00673                   {
00674                   if( iCurrentMedical == 0)
00675                         {
00676                               if( DoWeHaveThisManyBonusPoints( iMaxZeroBonus ) == TRUE )
00677                               {
00678                                 iCurrentMedical+=iMinAttribute;
00679                                 iCurrentBonusPoints-=iMaxZeroBonus;
00680                                     fSkillAtZeroWarning = FALSE;
00681                               }
00682                               else
00683                               {
00684                                     return( SLIDER_OK );
00685                               }
00686                         }
00687                         else
00688                         {
00689                           iCurrentMedical++;
00690                       iCurrentBonusPoints--;
00691                         }
00692                   }
00693             break;
00694             case( EXPLOSIVE_SKILL ):
00695               if( iCurrentExplosives > iMaxAttribute -1 )
00696                   {
00697                         // too high, leave
00698                         return( SLIDER_OUT_OF_RANGE );
00699       }
00700               else
00701                   {
00702                         if( iCurrentExplosives == 0)
00703                         {
00704                               if( DoWeHaveThisManyBonusPoints( iMaxZeroBonus ) == TRUE )
00705                               {
00706                                 iCurrentExplosives+=iMinAttribute;
00707                                 iCurrentBonusPoints-=iMaxZeroBonus;
00708                                     fSkillAtZeroWarning = FALSE;
00709                               }
00710                               else
00711                               {
00712                                     return( SLIDER_OK );
00713                               }
00714                         }
00715                         else
00716                         {
00717                           iCurrentExplosives++;
00718                       iCurrentBonusPoints--;
00719                         }
00720                   }
00721             break;
00722 
00723       }
00724 
00725       return( SLIDER_OK );
00726 }

00729 UINT8 DecrementStat( INT32 iStatToDecrement  )
00730 {
00731 
00732       INT32 iMinAttribute = gGameExternalOptions.iMinAttribute;
00733       INT32 iMaxZeroBonus = gGameExternalOptions.iMaxZeroBonus;
00734 
00735 
00736       // review mode, do not allow changes
00737   if( fReviewStats )
00738       {
00739             return( SLIDER_ERROR );
00740       }
00741 
00742   // decrement a stat
00743       // check to make sure stat isn't maxed out already
00744       switch( iStatToDecrement )
00745       {
00746             case( STRENGTH_ATTRIBUTE ):
00747                   if( iCurrentStrength > iMinAttribute )
00748                   {
00749                         // ok to decrement
00750                         iCurrentStrength--;
00751         iCurrentBonusPoints++;
00752                   }
00753                   else
00754                   {
00755                         return( SLIDER_OUT_OF_RANGE );
00756                   }
00757             break;
00758     case( DEXTERITY_ATTRIBUTE ):
00759                   if( iCurrentDexterity > iMinAttribute )
00760                   {
00761                         // ok to decrement
00762                         iCurrentDexterity--;
00763         iCurrentBonusPoints++;
00764                   }
00765                   else
00766                   {
00767                         return( SLIDER_OUT_OF_RANGE );
00768                   }
00769             break;
00770             case( AGILITY_ATTRIBUTE ):
00771                   if( iCurrentAgility > iMinAttribute )
00772                   {
00773                         // ok to decrement
00774                         iCurrentAgility--;
00775         iCurrentBonusPoints++;
00776                   }
00777                   else
00778                   {
00779                         return( SLIDER_OUT_OF_RANGE );
00780                   }
00781             break;
00782     case( WISDOM_ATTRIBUTE ):
00783                   if( iCurrentWisdom > iMinAttribute )
00784                   {
00785                         // ok to decrement
00786                         iCurrentWisdom--;
00787         iCurrentBonusPoints++;
00788                   }
00789                   else
00790                   {
00791                         return( SLIDER_OUT_OF_RANGE );
00792                   }
00793             break;
00794             case( LEADERSHIP_ATTRIBUTE ):
00795                   if( iCurrentLeaderShip > iMinAttribute )
00796                   {
00797                         // ok to decrement
00798                         iCurrentLeaderShip--;
00799         iCurrentBonusPoints++;
00800                   }
00801                   //Kaiden: Leadership couldn't be set to zero fixed below:
00802                   else if( iCurrentLeaderShip == iMinAttribute)
00803                   {
00804             // ok to decrement
00805                         iCurrentLeaderShip-=iMinAttribute;
00806         iCurrentBonusPoints+=iMaxZeroBonus;
00807                         fSkillAtZeroWarning = TRUE;
00808                   }
00809             break;
00810             case( HEALTH_ATTRIBUTE ):
00811                   if( iCurrentHealth > iMinAttribute )
00812                   {
00813                         // ok to decrement
00814                         iCurrentHealth--;
00815         iCurrentBonusPoints++;
00816                   }
00817                   else
00818                   {
00819                         return( SLIDER_OUT_OF_RANGE );
00820                   }
00821             break;
00822     case( MARKSMANSHIP_SKILL ):
00823                   if( iCurrentMarkmanship > iMinAttribute )
00824                   {
00825                         // ok to decrement
00826                         iCurrentMarkmanship--;
00827         iCurrentBonusPoints++;
00828                   }
00829                   else if( iCurrentMarkmanship == iMinAttribute)
00830                   {
00831             // ok to decrement
00832                         iCurrentMarkmanship-=iMinAttribute;
00833         iCurrentBonusPoints+=iMaxZeroBonus;
00834                         fSkillAtZeroWarning = TRUE;
00835                   }
00836             break;
00837             case( MEDICAL_SKILL ):
00838                   if( iCurrentMedical > iMinAttribute )
00839                   {
00840                         // ok to decrement
00841                         iCurrentMedical--;
00842         iCurrentBonusPoints++;
00843                   }
00844                   else if( iCurrentMedical == iMinAttribute)
00845                   {
00846             // ok to decrement
00847                         iCurrentMedical-=iMinAttribute;
00848         iCurrentBonusPoints+=iMaxZeroBonus;
00849                         fSkillAtZeroWarning = TRUE;
00850                   }
00851             break;
00852             case( MECHANICAL_SKILL ):
00853                   if( iCurrentMechanical > iMinAttribute )
00854                   {
00855                         // ok to decrement
00856                         iCurrentMechanical--;
00857         iCurrentBonusPoints++;
00858                   }
00859                   else if( iCurrentMechanical == iMinAttribute)
00860                   {
00861             // ok to decrement
00862                         iCurrentMechanical-=iMinAttribute;
00863         iCurrentBonusPoints+=iMaxZeroBonus;
00864                         fSkillAtZeroWarning = TRUE;
00865                   }
00866             break;
00867             case( EXPLOSIVE_SKILL ):
00868                   if( iCurrentExplosives > iMinAttribute )
00869                   {
00870                         // ok to decrement
00871                         iCurrentExplosives--;
00872         iCurrentBonusPoints++;
00873                   }
00874                   else if( iCurrentExplosives == iMinAttribute)
00875                   {
00876             // ok to decrement
00877                         iCurrentExplosives-=iMinAttribute;
00878         iCurrentBonusPoints+=iMaxZeroBonus;
00879                         fSkillAtZeroWarning = TRUE;
00880                   }
00881             break;
00882 
00883             
00884       }
00885       
00886       if( fSkillAtZeroWarning == TRUE )
00887       {
00888             // current stat at zero
00889             iCurrentStatAtZero = iStatToDecrement;
00890       }
00891 
00892       return( SLIDER_OK );
00893 }
00894 
00895 BOOLEAN DoWeHaveThisManyBonusPoints( INT32 iBonusPoints )
00896 {
00897 
00898       // returns if player has at least this many bonus points
00899       if( iCurrentBonusPoints >= iBonusPoints )
00900       {
00901             // yep, return true
00902             return ( TRUE );
00903       }
00904       else
00905       {
00906             // nope, return false
00907             return ( FALSE );
00908       }
00909 }

00919                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
00920                                                             BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnIMPAttributeFinishCallback );
00921   */
00922       giIMPAttributeSelectionButton[0] = CreateIconAndTextButton( giIMPAttributeSelectionButtonImage[0], pImpButtonText[ 11 ], FONT12ARIAL, 
00923                                                                                      FONT_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00924                                                                                      FONT_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW,

00926                                                                                      LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X +  ( 136 ), LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + ( 314 ), BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,

00947 
00948 void BtnIMPAttributeFinishCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00949 {
00950 
00951       // btn callback for IMP attrbite begin button
00952       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00953             return;
00954 
00955       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00956       {
00957              btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00958       }
00959       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00960       {
00961             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00962             {
00963       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00964                   
00965                   //are we done diting, or just reviewing the stats?
00966                   if( fReviewStats == TRUE )
00967                   {
00968                         iCurrentImpPage = IMP_FINISH;
00969                   }
00970                   else
00971                   {
00972         iCurrentImpPage = IMP_ATTRIBUTE_FINISH;
00973                   }
00974                   fButtonPendingFlag = TRUE;
00975             }
00976       }     
00977 }

00980 
00981 void RenderAttributeBoxes( void )
00982 {
00983 
00984       INT32 iMinAttribute = gGameExternalOptions.iMinAttribute;
00985 
00986 
00987   // this function will render the boxes in the sliding attribute bar, based on position
00988   INT32 iCnt=STRENGTH_ATTRIBUTE;
00989   INT16 sX = 0;
00990   INT16 sY = 0; 
00991       INT16 sTempY = 0;
00992       INT16 sTempX = 0;
00993   CHAR16 sString[3];
00994 
00995       // set last char to null
00996       sString[2] = 0;
00997 
00998       // font stuff
00999       SetFont(FONT10ARIAL);
01000       SetFontShadow(NO_SHADOW);
01001       SetFontForeground(FONT_WHITE);
01002       SetFontBackground(FONT_BLACK);
01003 
01004       // run through and render each slider bar
01005       for( iCnt = HEALTH_ATTRIBUTE; iCnt <= MECHANICAL_SKILL; iCnt++)
01006       {
01007             // position is  ( width *  ( stat - 35 ) ) /50]
01008             // unless 0, then it is 0 - for skills
01009             
01010             // get y position
01011             sY = SKILL_SLIDE_START_Y + SKILL_SLIDE_HEIGHT * ( ( INT16 )iCnt ) ;
01012 
01013             switch( iCnt )
01014             {
01015               case (STRENGTH_ATTRIBUTE):
01016                 // blt in strength slider
01017                         sX =  DetermineNewPosition( iCurrentStrength - iMinAttribute );
01018                         RenderSliderBar( sX, sY );
01019         
01020                         // set sliderbar mouse region
01021                         MSYS_MoveMouseRegionTo( &pSliderBarRegions[ iCnt ], ( INT16 )(sX + LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X ), ( INT16 )( sY + LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y ) );
01022 
01023                         // the text
01024                         swprintf( sString, L"%d", iCurrentStrength );
01025                         sX += LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X;
01026                         sY += LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y;
01027                         mprintf(sX + 13, sY + 3, sString);
01028               break;
01029                   case (DEXTERITY_ATTRIBUTE):
01030                 // blt in strength slider
01031                         sX =  DetermineNewPosition( iCurrentDexterity - iMinAttribute );
01032                         RenderSliderBar( sX, sY );
01033 
01034                         // set sliderbar mouse region
01035                         MSYS_MoveMouseRegionTo( &pSliderBarRegions[ iCnt ], ( INT16 )(sX + LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X ), ( INT16 )( sY + LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y ) );
01036 
01037                         // the text
01038                         swprintf( sString, L"%d", iCurrentDexterity );
01039                     sX += LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X;
01040                         sY += LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y;
01041                         mprintf(sX + 13, sY + 3, sString);
01042 
01043               break;
01044                   case (AGILITY_ATTRIBUTE):
01045                 // blt in strength slider
01046                         sX =  DetermineNewPosition( iCurrentAgility - iMinAttribute );
01047                         RenderSliderBar( sX, sY );
01048 
01049                         // set sliderbar mouse region
01050                   MSYS_MoveMouseRegionTo( &pSliderBarRegions[ iCnt ], ( INT16 )(sX + LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X ), ( INT16 )( sY + LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y ) );
01051 
01052                         // the text
01053                         swprintf( sString, L"%d", iCurrentAgility );
01054                         sX += LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X;
01055                         sY += LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y;
01056                         mprintf(sX + 13, sY + 3, sString);
01057 
01058               break;
01059                   case (WISDOM_ATTRIBUTE):
01060                 // blt in strength slider
01061                         sX =  DetermineNewPosition( iCurrentWisdom - iMinAttribute );
01062                         RenderSliderBar( sX, sY );
01063 
01064                         // set sliderbar mouse region
01065                         MSYS_MoveMouseRegionTo( &pSliderBarRegions[ iCnt ], ( INT16 )(sX + LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X ), ( INT16 )( sY + LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y ) );
01066 
01067                         // the text
01068                         swprintf( sString, L"%d", iCurrentWisdom );
01069                         sX += LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X;
01070                         sY += LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y;
01071                         mprintf(sX + 13, sY + 3, sString);
01072               break;
01073       case (LEADERSHIP_ATTRIBUTE):
01074                 // blt in strength slider
01075                         sX =  DetermineNewPosition( iCurrentLeaderShip - iMinAttribute );
01076                         RenderSliderBar( sX, sY );
01077         // set sliderbar mouse region
01078                         MSYS_MoveMouseRegionTo( &pSliderBarRegions[ iCnt ], ( INT16 )(sX + LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X ), ( INT16 )( sY + LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y ) );
01079 
01080                         // the text
01081                         swprintf( sString, L"%d", iCurrentLeaderShip ); 
01082                         sX += LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X;
01083                         sY += LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y;
01084                         mprintf(sX + 13 , sY + 3, sString);
01085               break;
01086                   case (HEALTH_ATTRIBUTE):
01087                 // blt in health slider
01088                         sX =  DetermineNewPosition( iCurrentHealth - iMinAttribute );
01089                         RenderSliderBar( sX, sY );
01090 
01091         // set sliderbar mouse region
01092                         MSYS_MoveMouseRegionTo( &pSliderBarRegions[ iCnt ], ( INT16 )(sX + LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X ), ( INT16 )( sY + LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y ) );
01093 
01094                         // the text
01095                         swprintf( sString, L"%d", iCurrentHealth );
01096                     sY += LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y;
01097                         sX += LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X;
01098                         mprintf(sX + 13, sY + 3, sString);
01099               break;
01100       case (MARKSMANSHIP_SKILL):
01101                 // blt in marksmanship slider
01102                         
01103                         sX =  DetermineNewPosition( iCurrentMarkmanship - iMinAttribute );
01104                         RenderSliderBar( sX, sY );
01105         // set sliderbar mouse region
01106                         MSYS_MoveMouseRegionTo( &pSliderBarRegions[ iCnt ], ( INT16 )(sX + LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X ), ( INT16 )( sY + LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y ) );
01107 
01108 
01109                         // the text
01110                         swprintf( sString, L"%d", iCurrentMarkmanship );
01111                     sY += LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y;
01112                         sX += LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X;
01113                         mprintf(sX + 13, sY + 3, sString);
01114               break;
01115       case (MEDICAL_SKILL):
01116                 // blt in medical slider
01117                         
01118                         sX =  DetermineNewPosition( iCurrentMedical - iMinAttribute );
01119                         RenderSliderBar( sX, sY );
01120 
01121                         // set sliderbar mouse region
01122                         MSYS_MoveMouseRegionTo( &pSliderBarRegions[ iCnt ], ( INT16 )(sX + LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X ), ( INT16 )( sY + LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y ) );
01123 
01124                         // the text
01125                         swprintf( sString, L"%d", iCurrentMedical );
01126                     sY += LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y;
01127                         sX += LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X;
01128                         mprintf(sX + 13, sY + 3, sString);
01129               break;
01130       case (MECHANICAL_SKILL):
01131                 // blt in mech slider
01132                         
01133                         sX =  DetermineNewPosition( iCurrentMechanical - iMinAttribute );
01134                         RenderSliderBar( sX, sY );
01135 
01136                         // set sliderbar mouse region
01137                         MSYS_MoveMouseRegionTo( &pSliderBarRegions[ iCnt ], ( INT16 )(sX + LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X ), ( INT16 )( sY + LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y ) );
01138 
01139 
01140                         // the text
01141                         swprintf( sString, L"%d", iCurrentMechanical );
01142                     sY += LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y;
01143                         sX += LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X;
01144                         mprintf(sX + 13, sY + 3, sString);
01145               break;
01146                   case (EXPLOSIVE_SKILL):
01147                 // blt in explosive slider
01148                         
01149                         sX =  DetermineNewPosition( iCurrentExplosives - iMinAttribute );
01150                         RenderSliderBar( sX, sY );
01151 
01152                         // set sliderbar mouse region
01153                         MSYS_MoveMouseRegionTo( &pSliderBarRegions[ iCnt ], ( INT16 )(sX + LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X ), ( INT16 )( sY + LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y ) );
01154 
01155                         // the text
01156                         swprintf( sString, L"%d", iCurrentExplosives );
01157                     sY += LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y;
01158                         sX += LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X;
01159                         mprintf(sX + 13, sY + 3, sString);
01160               break;
01161 
01162             }
01163       }
01164 
01165             // reset shadow
01166       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
01167 
01168       return;
01169 }

01173 void CreateAttributeSliderButtons( void )
01174 {
01175       // this function will create the buttons for the attribute slider
01176   // the finished button
01177   INT32 iCounter =0;
01178       
01179       giIMPAttributeSelectionSliderButtonImage[ 0 ]=  LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\AttributeArrows.sti" ,-1,0,-1,1,-1 );
01180   giIMPAttributeSelectionSliderButtonImage[ 1 ]=  LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\AttributeArrows.sti" ,-1,3,-1,4,-1 );
01181 
01182       for(iCounter = 0; iCounter < 20; iCounter+=2 )
01183       {
01184         // left button - decrement stat
01185        giIMPAttributeSelectionSliderButton[ iCounter ] = QuickCreateButton( giIMPAttributeSelectionSliderButtonImage[ 0 ], LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X +  ( 163 ), ( INT16 ) ( LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + ( 99 + iCounter / 2 * 20 ) ),
01186                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
01187                                                             BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnIMPAttributeSliderLeftCallback );
01188       
01189     // right button - increment stat 
01190        giIMPAttributeSelectionSliderButton[ iCounter + 1 ] = QuickCreateButton( giIMPAttributeSelectionSliderButtonImage[ 1 ], LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X +  ( 419 ), ( INT16 ) ( LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + ( 99 + iCounter / 2 * 20 ) ),
01191                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
01192                                                             BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnIMPAttributeSliderRightCallback );
01193         
01194             SetButtonCursor(giIMPAttributeSelectionSliderButton[iCounter], CURSOR_WWW);
01195             SetButtonCursor(giIMPAttributeSelectionSliderButton[iCounter + 1 ], CURSOR_WWW);
01196             // set user data
01197             MSYS_SetBtnUserData(giIMPAttributeSelectionSliderButton[iCounter],0, iCounter / 2 );
01198             MSYS_SetBtnUserData(giIMPAttributeSelectionSliderButton[iCounter + 1],0, iCounter / 2 );
01199       }
01200 
01201       MarkButtonsDirty( );
01202 }
01203

01213       UnloadButtonImage(giIMPAttributeSelectionSliderButtonImage[ 1 ] );

01224 
01225 
01226 void BtnIMPAttributeSliderLeftCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01227 {
01228       INT32 iValue = -1;
01229 
01230       // btn callback for IMP personality quiz answer button
01231       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
01232             return;
01233       
01234       
01235       iValue = (INT32)MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
01236 
01237       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_REPEAT )
01238       { 
01239       DecrementStat( iValue );
01240                   // stat has changed, rerender
01241       fHasAnySlidingBarMoved = TRUE;
01242                   uiBarToReRender = iValue;           
01243       }
01244       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01245       {
01246             
01247     DecrementStat( iValue );
01248             fHasAnySlidingBarMoved = TRUE;  
01249             btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
01250     uiBarToReRender = iValue;
01251       }
01252 
01253       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01254       {
01255             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
01256             {
01257       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
01258                   
01259             }
01260       }
01261 }
01262 
01263 
01264 void BtnIMPAttributeSliderRightCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01265 {
01266   INT32 iValue = -1;
01267 
01268       // btn callback for IMP personality quiz answer button
01269       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
01270             return;
01271 
01272       iValue = (INT32)MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
01273 
01274       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_REPEAT )
01275       { 
01276       IncrementStat( iValue  );
01277                   // stat has changed, rerender
01278       fHasAnySlidingBarMoved = TRUE;
01279                   uiBarToReRender = iValue;           
01280       }
01281       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01282       {
01283             
01284     IncrementStat( iValue );
01285             fHasAnySlidingBarMoved = TRUE;
01286             uiBarToReRender = iValue;           
01287             btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
01288         
01289       }
01290 
01291       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01292       {
01293             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
01294             {
01295       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
01296                   
01297             }
01298       }
01299 }

01302 
01303 void CreateSlideRegionMouseRegions( void )
01304 {
01305       // this function will create that mouse regions on the sliding area, that, if the player clicks on, the bar will automatically jump to
01306   INT32 iCounter = 0;
01307       
01308       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < 10; iCounter++ )
01309       {
01310              // define the region
01311              MSYS_DefineRegion( &pSliderRegions[ iCounter ], ( INT16 ) ( SKILL_SLIDE_START_X + LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X), ( INT16 ) ( LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + SKILL_SLIDE_START_Y + iCounter * SKILL_SLIDE_HEIGHT ) , ( INT16 ) ( LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + SKILL_SLIDE_START_X + BAR_WIDTH ), ( INT16 ) ( LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + SKILL_SLIDE_START_Y + iCounter * SKILL_SLIDE_HEIGHT + 15 ),
01312                   MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH + 2, CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SliderRegionButtonCallback);
01313        
01314              // define user data
01315                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData(&pSliderRegions[iCounter],0,iCounter);
01316              // now add it
01317              MSYS_AddRegion(&pSliderRegions[ iCounter ]);
01318       }
01319 
01320   return;
01321 }
01322 
01323 void CreateSliderBarMouseRegions( void )
01324 {
01325 
01326       INT32 iMinAttribute = gGameExternalOptions.iMinAttribute;
01327 
01328       // this function will create that mouse regions on the sliding bars, that, if the player clicks on, the bar will automatically jump to
01329   INT32 iCounter = 0;
01330       INT16 sX = 0;
01331 
01332       // set the starting X
01333       sX = DetermineNewPosition( gGameExternalOptions.iStartAttribute - iMinAttribute );
01334 
01335       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < 10; iCounter++ )
01336       {
01337              // define the region
01338              MSYS_DefineRegion( &pSliderBarRegions[ iCounter ], ( INT16 ) ( sX ), ( INT16 ) ( LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + SKILL_SLIDE_START_Y + iCounter * SKILL_SLIDE_HEIGHT ) , ( INT16 ) (sX + SLIDER_BAR_WIDTH ), ( INT16 ) ( LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + SKILL_SLIDE_START_Y + iCounter * SKILL_SLIDE_HEIGHT + 15 ),
01339                   MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH + 2, CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SliderBarRegionButtonCallback);
01340        
01341              // define user data
01342                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData(&pSliderBarRegions[iCounter],0,iCounter);
01343              // now add it
01344              MSYS_AddRegion(&pSliderBarRegions[ iCounter ]);
01345       }
01346 
01347   return;
01348 }
01349 
01350 
01351 void DestroySlideRegionMouseRegions( void )
01352 {
01353   // this function will destroy the regions user for the slider ' jumping' 
01354       INT32 iCounter=0;
01355   
01356       // delete the regions
01357       for( iCounter=0; iCounter < 10; iCounter++ )
01358       {
01359        MSYS_RemoveRegion( &pSliderRegions[ iCounter ] );
01360       }
01361 
01362       return;
01363 }

01379 
01380 
01381 void SliderRegionButtonCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
01382 {
01383       
01384       INT32 iMinAttribute = gGameExternalOptions.iMinAttribute;
01385       INT32 iMaxAttribute = gGameExternalOptions.iMaxAttribute;
01386 
01387   INT32 iCurrentAttributeValue = 0;
01388   INT32 iNewAttributeValue = 0; 
01389   INT32 iAttributeDelta = 0;
01390   INT32 iCounter =0; 
01391   INT16 sX =0;
01392       INT16 sY = 0;
01393       static INT16 sOldX = -1;
01394       static INT16 sOldY = -1;
01395       static INT32 iAttribute = -1;
01396       INT32 iNewValue = 0;
01397       INT32 iCurrentValue = 0;
01398   INT16 sNewX = -1;
01399       
01400 
01401       //if we already have an anchored slider bar
01402       if( gpCurrentScrollBox != pRegion && gpCurrentScrollBox != NULL )
01403             return;
01404 
01405 
01406   if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
01407   {
01408         return;
01409   }
01410       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_REPEAT)
01411   {
01412             if( fSlideIsActive == FALSE)
01413             { 
01414                   // not active leave
01415       return;  
01416             }
01417 
01418 
01419         // check to see if we have moved  
01420         if( MSYS_GetRegionUserData(pRegion, 0) != iAttribute )
01421             {
01422                   // different regions
01423                   iAttribute = MSYS_GetRegionUserData(pRegion, 0);
01424               sOldX = -1;
01425                   sOldY = -1;
01426       return;
01427             }
01428 
01429             uiBarToReRender = iAttribute;
01430 
01431             giCurrentlySelectedStat = iAttribute;
01432             gpCurrentScrollBox = pRegion;
01433 
01434     // get new attribute value x
01435             sNewX = pRegion->MouseXPos;
01436     
01437             // sOldX has been reset, set to sNewX
01438             if( sOldX == -1)
01439             {
01440                   sOldX = sNewX;
01441               return;
01442             }
01443             // check against old x
01444             if( sNewX != sOldX )
01445             {
01446 
01447                   // get old stat value
01448               iCurrentAttributeValue = GetCurrentAttributeValue( iAttribute );
01449                   iNewValue = DetermineNewValue( sNewX );
01450                   // chenged, move mouse region if change large enough
01451       if( iCurrentAttributeValue != iNewValue )
01452                   {
01453          // update screen
01454          fHasAnySlidingBarMoved = TRUE;
01455                   }
01456 
01457       // change is enough
01458       if ( iNewValue - iCurrentAttributeValue > 0)
01459                   {
01460                         // positive, increment stat
01461         iCounter = iNewValue - iCurrentAttributeValue;
01462                         for( iCounter; iCounter > 0; iCounter--)
01463                         {
01464                               IncrementStat( iAttribute );
01465                         }
01466                   }
01467                   else
01468                   {
01469                         // negative, decrement stat
01470         iCounter = iCurrentAttributeValue - iNewValue;
01471                         for( iCounter; iCounter > 0; iCounter--)
01472                         {
01473                               DecrementStat( iAttribute );
01474                         }
01475                   }
01476                         
01477                   sOldX = sNewX;          
01478             }
01479       }
01480   else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
01481   {
01482     
01483             if( fSlideIsActive )
01484             {
01485       // reset slide is active flag
01486               fSlideIsActive = FALSE;
01487                   return;
01488             }
01489             
01490 
01491             // get mouse XY
01492             
01493             sX = pRegion -> MouseXPos;
01494             sY = pRegion -> MouseYPos;
01495 
01496     // which region are we in?
01497     
01498             // get attribute
01499             iAttribute = MSYS_GetRegionUserData(pRegion, 0);
01500     uiBarToReRender = iAttribute;
01501 
01502             // get value of attribute
01503             iCurrentAttributeValue = GetCurrentAttributeValue( iAttribute );
01504     
01505             // set the new attribute value based on position of mouse click
01506             iNewAttributeValue = DetermineNewValue( sX );
01507 
01508             // too high, reset to MAX_ATTIBUTEPOINT
01509             if( iNewAttributeValue > iMaxAttribute )
01510     {
01511                   iNewAttributeValue = iMaxAttribute;
01512             }
01513                   
01514             // get the delta
01515             iAttributeDelta = iCurrentAttributeValue - iNewAttributeValue;
01516     
01517             // set Counter
01518             iCounter = iAttributeDelta;
01519 
01520             // check if increment or decrement
01521             if( iAttributeDelta > 0)
01522             {
01523                   // decrement
01524                   for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iAttributeDelta; iCounter++ )
01525                   {
01526         DecrementStat( iAttribute );
01527                   }
01528             }
01529             else
01530             {
01531                   // increment attribute
01532       for( iCounter = iAttributeDelta; iCounter < 0; iCounter++ )
01533                   {
01534                         if( iCurrentAttributeValue == 0)
01535                         {
01536                               iCounter = 0;
01537                         }
01538         IncrementStat( iAttribute );
01539                   }
01540             }
01541 
01542             // update screen
01543     fHasAnySlidingBarMoved = TRUE;
01544 
01545 
01546   }
01547   else if ( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP )
01548   {
01549   
01550 
01551   }
01552       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01553       {
01554 
01555             // get mouse positions
01556             sX = pRegion -> MouseXPos;
01557             sY = pRegion -> MouseYPos;
01558 
01559             // get attribute
01560             iAttribute = MSYS_GetRegionUserData(pRegion, 0);
01561     uiBarToReRender = iAttribute;
01562 
01563             // get value of attribute
01564             iCurrentAttributeValue = GetCurrentAttributeValue( iAttribute );
01565     
01566             // get the boxes bounding x
01567             sNewX = DetermineNewPosition( iCurrentAttributeValue - iMinAttribute );
01568         sNewX += LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X;
01569 
01570             // the sNewX is below 0, reset to zero
01571             if( sNewX < 0 )
01572             {
01573                   sNewX = 0;
01574             }
01575 
01576             if( ( sX > sNewX )&&( sX < sNewX + SLIDER_BAR_WIDTH) )
01577             {
01578                   // we are within the slide bar, set fact we want to drag and draw
01579        fSlideIsActive = TRUE;
01580             }
01581             else
01582             {
01583                   // otherwise want to jump to position
01584                   fSlideIsActive =FALSE;
01585             }
01586       }
01587  
01588 }
01589 
01590 void SliderBarRegionButtonCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
01591 { 
01592   
01593 
01594       if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01595       {
01596     fSlideIsActive = TRUE;
01597             SliderRegionButtonCallback( &pSliderRegions[ MSYS_GetRegionUserData(pRegion, 0) ], MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_REPEAT);
01598       }
01599       if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01600       {
01601             fSlideIsActive = FALSE;
01602       }
01603     
01604 }
01605 
01606 INT32 GetCurrentAttributeValue( INT32 iAttribute )
01607 {
01608       // this function will get the value of the attribute that was passed to this fucntion via iAttribute
01609   INT32 iValue =0;
01610 
01611   switch( iAttribute )
01612       {
01613             case ( STRENGTH_ATTRIBUTE ):
01614                   iValue = iCurrentStrength;
01615             break;
01616             case ( DEXTERITY_ATTRIBUTE ):
01617                   iValue = iCurrentDexterity;
01618             break;
01619     case ( AGILITY_ATTRIBUTE ):
01620                   iValue = iCurrentAgility;
01621             break;
01622     case ( HEALTH_ATTRIBUTE ):
01623                   iValue = iCurrentHealth;
01624             break;
01625             case ( WISDOM_ATTRIBUTE ):
01626                   iValue = iCurrentWisdom;
01627             break;
01628             case ( LEADERSHIP_ATTRIBUTE ):
01629                   iValue = iCurrentLeaderShip;
01630             break;
01631             case ( MARKSMANSHIP_SKILL ):
01632                   iValue = iCurrentMarkmanship;
01633             break;
01634             case ( MEDICAL_SKILL ):
01635                   iValue = iCurrentMedical;
01636             break;
01637             case ( MECHANICAL_SKILL ):
01638                   iValue = iCurrentMechanical;
01639             break;
01640             case ( EXPLOSIVE_SKILL ):
01641                   iValue = iCurrentExplosives;
01642             break;
01643 
01644     
01645       }
01646 
01647       return iValue;
01648 }

01651 void SetAttributes( void )
01652 {
01653       INT8  bExtraPoints;
01654 /*
01655   // set attributes and skills based on what is in charprofile.c
01656     
01657       // attributes
01658         iCurrentStrength = iStrength + iAddStrength;
01659             iCurrentDexterity = iDexterity + iAddDexterity;
01660             iCurrentHealth = iHealth + iAddHealth;
01661             iCurrentLeaderShip = iLeadership + iAddLeadership;
01662             iCurrentWisdom = iWisdom + iAddWisdom;
01663             iCurrentAgility = iAgility + iAddAgility;
01664 
01665       // skills
01666     iCurrentMarkmanship = iMarksmanship + iAddMarksmanship;
01667             iCurrentMechanical = iMechanical + iAddMechanical;
01668             iCurrentMedical = iMedical + iAddMedical;
01669             iCurrentExplosives = iExplosives + iAddExplosives;
01670  
01671             // reset bonus pts
01672     iCurrentBonusPoints = 40;
01673 */
01674 
01675       iCurrentStrength = gGameExternalOptions.iStartAttribute;
01676       iCurrentDexterity = gGameExternalOptions.iStartAttribute;
01677       iCurrentHealth = gGameExternalOptions.iStartAttribute;
01678       iCurrentLeaderShip = gGameExternalOptions.iStartAttribute;
01679       iCurrentWisdom = gGameExternalOptions.iStartAttribute;
01680       iCurrentAgility = gGameExternalOptions.iStartAttribute;
01681 
01682       // skills
01683       iCurrentMarkmanship = gGameExternalOptions.iStartAttribute;
01684       iCurrentMechanical = gGameExternalOptions.iStartAttribute;
01685       iCurrentMedical = gGameExternalOptions.iStartAttribute;
01686       iCurrentExplosives = gGameExternalOptions.iStartAttribute;
01687 
01688 
01689       // reset bonus pts
01690       //iCurrentBonusPoints = 40;
01691       iCurrentBonusPoints = gGameExternalOptions.iImpAttributePoints;
01692 
01693 
01694       //Determine if the player has any extra points 
01695       bExtraPoints = DoesPlayerHaveExtraAttibutePointsToDistributeBasedOnSkillSelection();
01696 
01697       if( bExtraPoints > 0 )
01698       {
01699             iCurrentBonusPoints += bExtraPoints;
01700       }
01701       
01702 
01703       ResetIncrementCharacterAttributes( );
01704 
01705       return;
01706 }

01709 void DrawBonusPointsRemaining( void )
01710 {
01711   // draws the amount of points remaining player has
01712       CHAR16 sString[64];
01713 
01714       // just reviewing, don't blit stats
01715       if( fReviewStats == TRUE )
01716       {
01717     return;
01718       }
01719       // parse amountof bns pts remaining
01720       swprintf(sString, L"%d", iCurrentBonusPoints);
01721 
01722       // set font color
01723       SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
01724   SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
01725   SetFont( FONT12ARIAL );
01726       // print string
01727       mprintf( LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + 425 ,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + 51, sString );
01728 
01729       InvalidateRegion( LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + 425, LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + 51, LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + 475, LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + 71 );
01730       return;
01731 }

01755 void StatAtZeroBoxCallBack( UINT8 bExitValue )
01756 {
01757       // yes, so start over, else stay here and do nothing for now
01758   if( bExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
01759       {
01760             MarkButtonsDirty();
01761       }
01762       else if( bExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_NO )
01763       {
01764             IncrementStat( iCurrentStatAtZero );
01765             fHasAnySlidingBarMoved = TRUE;
01766             MarkButtonsDirty();
01767       }
01768 
01769       return;
01770 }
01771 
01772 INT32 DetermineNewValue( INT32 iNewX )
01773 {
01774 
01775       INT32 iMinAttribute = gGameExternalOptions.iMinAttribute;
01776       INT32 iMaxAttribute = gGameExternalOptions.iMaxAttribute;
01777 
01778       INT32 iNewValue=0;
01779       INT32 iStartLoc = SKILL_SLIDE_START_X + LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X;
01780       INT32 iPositionX = iNewX - iStartLoc;
01781       FLOAT fPercentOfBar=0.0f;
01782             
01783 
01784       fPercentOfBar = iPositionX / ( FLOAT)( BAR_WIDTH - SLIDER_BAR_WIDTH );
01785 
01786       iNewValue = (INT32)( fPercentOfBar * ( iMaxAttribute - (FLOAT)iMinAttribute ) );
01787 
01788       iNewValue += iMinAttribute;
01789 
01790       // too high, reset to MAX_ATTIBUTEPOINT
01791       if( iNewValue > iMaxAttribute )
01792   {
01793             iNewValue = iMaxAttribute;
01794       }
01795 
01796       return( iNewValue );
01797 }
01798 
01799 
01800 INT32 DetermineNewPosition( INT32 iAttribute )
01801 {
01802 
01803       INT32 iMinAttribute = gGameExternalOptions.iMinAttribute;
01804       INT32 iMaxAttribute = gGameExternalOptions.iMaxAttribute;
01805 
01806       INT32 iNewLoc=0;
01807       INT32 iStartLoc = SKILL_SLIDE_START_X;
01808       FLOAT fPercentOfBar=0.0f;
01809       FLOAT fBasePixelScaleWidth = ( ( BAR_WIDTH - SLIDER_BAR_WIDTH ) / (FLOAT)( iMaxAttribute - iMinAttribute ) );
01810             
01811       iNewLoc = (INT32)(iAttribute * fBasePixelScaleWidth);
01812 
01813       if( iNewLoc < 0 )
01814       {
01815             iNewLoc = 0;
01816       }
01817 
01818       iNewLoc += iStartLoc;
01819 
01820       return( iNewLoc );
01821 }
